welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Greencastle, where small-town charm meets historic landmarks and natural beauty. We invite you to explore our quaint city and discover why it's known as the 'Gem of Indiana.' Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hulman Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and gift shops.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Hulman Field Airport is used for private and charter flights, with its own dedicated parking and service facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as Southwest and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and American.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
